info.name: histogram
info.summary: histogram: fundamental data object for scientific data reduction and analysis

info.author: Jiao Lin
info.description:
The histogram package provides a basic data object for scientific data
reduction and analysis packages.

The histogram package has a simple python API to manipulate, store, 
and plot histograms.
